reviews.review: I thought this game was very fun and had a lot of good atmosphere and puzzles to it. on my first play through here are a lot of secrets and other things that i missed that i played the game again to get.

The puzzle-solving in this game is absolutely fantastic, and it makes you think about how many ways you can solve a problem with only two portals. It's not just a puzzle game though, it also has a really good story, coupled with amazing jokes and characters.

Как и все игроки я все ещё жду Portal 3 или хотя бы какую-то игру в компьютеризированный экспериментальный центр при лаборатории исследования природы порталов. Всем, кто ещё не попробовал данную часть серии Portal советую прямо сейчас пройти её.

A classic. Eminently enjoyable. Thoughtful, challenging and incredibly amusing. PLAY THIS GAME.

Might be the best puzzle game... ever made. Absolutely the gold standard for the puzzle/platform genre. The ingenuity of the puzzles and situations are mind-boggling: original, logically consistent and exceedingly clever. The pacing is superb. And that's just in the game play department. The writing, especially for dialogue, is sheer genius. The voice performances are out of this world. The graphics, while no longer gorgeous, are still more than serviceable nearly ten years on.

The above only takes into consideration the single-player campaign. There's an entire campaign available for co-operative play, as well. That's something of a rarity in the modern-ish era. Since co-op play is still a game mode desired by many gamers, it's inclusion in "Portal 2" is just one more reason this game is rightfully considered one of the best.

10/10, all the thumbs up. Recommended for: everyone that played the first "Portal"; fans of puzzles; fans of platformers; devotees of Valve's catalog; those who enjoy humor in their games; people wanting games that seamlessly merge game play and storytelling.

edit: another multi-post as the path to success. Third time proved the charm, however.

Oh this is such a good game. It requires alot of thinking but is also has fun implemented into the games mechanics. In my opinion it has more of a storyline than the original. More than just being tested in the aperture science test chambers, you are interacting with the outside world. I definitely recommend it.
My only downside is that sometimes it doesn't focus as much on the modern look of the aperture science laboratory. Anyways, great game. Just stop reading this comment and BUY IT!

This game is some of the most fun playing a puzzle game I've had for a long time.  It took me forever to get it (mostly because I bought it for ninety-nine cents and I'm a broke-ass college student working part time) but this is a really fun game and my sister loves it, too.
Must play. The visuals, gameplay, and writing are all top-tier. There's not even much more to say. It's completely fantastic.

This game is, without a doubt, one of the best video games I've ever played. I thought the first Portal was phenomenal, but this is even better. It is a perfect sequel. Not just in terms of being a sequel to Portal, but any sequel ever.

When I first entered most rooms and chambers, my initial thought was that I wasn't going to be able to figure this puzzle out. But after taking in the surroundings, trying different things, and thinking critically, solving each one was extremely satisfying. These puzzles have a way of making the player feel very intuitive and rewarded upon completion.

Everything about this game is fantastic. Atmosphere, music, voice acting, pacing, level and puzzle design.
ver los créditos fué una tortura, aparte no me dieron nada por acarrear a mi compañero. 2/10
